threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: @alt_right bro, i feel ya, but what about the ppl who can't afford those rising prices? we need gov't help, not more wars. let's invest in renewables, create jobs, and make america inclusive 🌍💚
